data.name: Women - Men's Fashion
data.desc: Al-Amer Mall contains stores that sell the finest brands and the latest collections of various modern and classic designs suitable for both genders and meet the needs of everyone.

data.name: Kids - Pregnant Ladies Fashion
data.desc: From maternity clothes to trendy boys' clothes, you will find everything you are looking for in mothers' and Kids' stores. Al-Amer Mall provides you with everything you need for your newborn, suitable for both genders.

data.name: Electronics - Telephones - Household Appliances - home decorations
data.desc: Al-Amer Mall provides you with many stores specializing in electronic devices, mobile phones and household item to meet everyone's needs.

data.name: Optics - Sunglasses
data.desc: Al-Amer Mall contains a wide range of eyeglasses and lenses stores.

data.name: Accessories - bags - shoes
data.desc: Al-Amer Mall offers a wide variety of bags and shoes stores from the latest launches of the season.

data.name: Watches - Jewelry
data.desc: Al-Amer Mall offers an impressive collection of watches and jewelry stores to suit all tastes and budgets.

data.name: Sports and Entertainment
data.desc: Al-Amer Mall contains a wide variety of major sports stores.

data.name: Pharmacies - Cosmetics - Perfumes - Beauties
data.desc: Al-Amer Mall provides you with a lot of options from skin care products to cosmetics, and perfumes. You will find in the mall what satisfies your taste and gives you the perfect look.

data.name: Games - gifts - stationery - books
data.desc: Al-Amer Mall contains a wide range of stores specialized in Kids' toys and other gifts to suit all your occasions.

data.name: Services - specialty stores
data.desc: Al-Amer Mall provides the best interface in Al-hasa for shopping and entertainment, but it also contains a wide variety of specialized stores that provide various services such as branches of telecommunications companies, where you can buy a new phone line or pay bills while touring the mall.
